functions.tag: {display:{Name:'{"text":"Faded Scroll","color":"light_purple","italic":false}',Lore:['{"text":"Thanks for playing!","color":"gray","italic":false}','{"text":"~True Survival~","color":"dark_green"}']},CustomModelData:5101106,tsurv.trophy:1b,title:"Triumph",author:"Devon's Desk",generation:0,pages:['{"text":"Lords may take by miles. \\nKings may take by horizons. \\nBut they are no more. \\nInches will do just fine."}']}
